terms.content:
Welcome to our platform, a comprehensive marketplace connecting clients and service partners.

1. Platform Overview

Our platform provides a unique ecosystem where:

  • Clients can publish diverse advertisements for services they require
  • Partners can offer their professional services and respond to client needs

2. User Responsibilities

All users must:

  • Provide accurate and truthful information
  • Maintain professional communication
  • Respect the platform's guidelines and legal requirements

3. Client Responsibilities

Clients using the platform to publish advertisements must:

  • Clearly describe service requirements
  • Provide realistic expectations
  • Communicate transparently with potential service partners

4. Partner Responsibilities

Service partners must:

  • Possess necessary qualifications for offered services
  • Respond promptly to client inquiries
  • Deliver services with professionalism and integrity

5. Transaction and Communication

The platform facilitates connections but is not directly responsible for:

  • Service quality
  • Pricing negotiations
  • Final agreements between clients and partners

6. Intellectual Property and Privacy

All content on the platform is protected. Users must respect intellectual property rights and adhere to privacy policies.

7. Limitation of Liability

Our platform provides a service marketplace and is not liable for direct or indirect damages arising from user interactions.

8. Modifications to Terms

We reserve the right to update these terms. Continued platform use constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

Last Updated: %last_updated_date%

contact.content:
Get in Touch

We'd love to hear from you! Please use the contact information provided or visit us during business hours.

privacy.content:
1. Introduction

Welcome to %app_name%. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, protect, and manage your personal information when you use our service marketplace platform.

2. Information We Collect

  • Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number)
  • Profile information for service providers and clients
  • Communication records between clients and service providers
  • Usage data and platform interaction logs

3. How We Use Your Information

  • Facilitate service connections between clients and providers
  • Improve platform functionality and user experience
  • Send important notifications and updates
  • Respond to customer support requests

4. Data Protection

  • We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data
  • Personal information is encrypted and stored securely
  • Access to data is strictly limited to authorized personnel

5. User Consent and Control

  • You can review and update your personal information
  • You can request data deletion or account closure
  • We obtain explicit consent before processing sensitive data

6. Third-Party Sharing

We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. Information may be shared only:

  • With your explicit consent
  • To comply with legal obligations
  • To protect our platform's rights and safety

7. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies to enhance user experience and platform functionality. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

8. Contact Information

For privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact us at:

  • Email: %support_email%
  • Address: %support_address%

9. Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The latest version will always be available on our platform.

Last Updated: %last_updated_date%
